about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

name: python-framel
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.20.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: python-framel
    version: 8.40.1
source:
    sha256: ea4afcdf839f8eb49edc2d3190b5aebb08871146e426b644887f7efbae30a6b9
    url: http://software.igwn.org/sources/source/framel-8.40.1.tar.xz
build:
    ignore_run_exports:
        - python
    number: 2
    string: py36h8062767_2
requirements:
    build:
        - bzip2 1.0.8 haf1e3a3_3
        - c-ares 1.16.1 haf1e3a3_3
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h8e49ea9_16
        - clang 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - clang_osx-64 10.0.1 h05bbb7f_10
        - clangxx 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - cmake 3.18.2 hdf3d1b2_0
        - compiler-rt 10.0.1 he6db49b_0
        - compiler-rt_osx-64 10.0.1 h033240e_0
        - expat 2.2.9 hb1e8313_2
        - krb5 1.17.1 h75d18d8_3
        - ld64_osx-64 530 h3c32e8a_7
        - ldid 2.1.2 h7660a38_2
        - libclang-cpp10 10.0.1 default_hf57f61e_1
        - libcurl 7.71.1 h9bf37e3_8
        - libcxx 11.0.0 h439d374_0
        - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
        - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_1
        - libllvm10 10.0.1 h009f743_3
        - libllvm11 11.0.0 hf85e3d2_0
        - libnghttp2 1.41.0 h7580e61_2
        - libssh2 1.9.0 h8a08a2b_5
        - libuv 1.40.0 h22f3db7_0
        - llvm-tools 10.0.1 h1341992_3
        - make 4.3 h22f3db7_1
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_2
        - openssl 1.1.1h haf1e3a3_0
        - rhash 1.3.6 haf1e3a3_1001
        - tapi 1000.10.8 h879752b_4
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_1
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1010
    host:
        - ca-certificates 2020.6.20 hecda079_0
        - libblas 3.8.0 17_openblas
        - libcblas 3.8.0 17_openblas
        - libcxx 11.0.0 h439d374_0
        - libffi 3.2.1 hb1e8313_1007
        - libframel 8.40.1 haf1e3a3_2
        - libgfortran 5.0.0 h7cc5361_13
        - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h7cc5361_13
        - liblapack 3.8.0 17_openblas
        - libopenblas 0.3.10 openmp_h54245bb_5
        - llvm-openmp 11.0.0 h73239a0_1
        - ncurses 6.2 hb1e8313_2
        - numpy 1.16.5 py36hde6bac1_0
        - openssl 1.1.1h haf1e3a3_0
        - python 3.6.11 hc38f9c5_2_cpython
        - python_abi 3.6 1_cp36m
        - readline 8.0 h0678c8f_2
        - sqlite 3.33.0 h960bd1c_1
        - tk 8.6.10 hb0a8c7a_1
        - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
        - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1010
    run:
        - libframel 8.40.1 haf1e3a3_2
        - numpy >=1.16.5,<2.0a0
        - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
        - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
test:
    commands:
        - 'python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal;
            import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path(''data'') / ''test.gwf''),
            ''D1''); framel.frputvect(''test2.gwf'', [{''name'': ''A1:TEST'', ''data'':
            indata[0], ''start'': indata[1], ''dx'': indata[3], ''x_unit'': indata[4],
            ''y_unit'': indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d(''test2.gwf'',
            ''A1:TEST''); assert_array_equal(indata[0], indata2[0], ''read-write data
            mismatch''); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:], ''read-write metadata mismatch'';
            "

            '
    imports:
        - framel
    source_files:
        - data/test.gwf
about:
    description: 'A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave

        Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.

        The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation

        including file input/output.

        This package provides the python bindings.'
    home: http://lappweb.in2p3.fr/virgo/FrameL/
    license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
    license_family: LGPL
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: LIGO/Virgo Frame Library
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    feedstock-name: framel
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - anthchirp
        - duncanmmacleod

about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

commands: python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal; import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path('data') / 'test.gwf'), 'D1'); framel.frputvect('test2.gwf', [{'name': 'A1:TEST', 'data': indata[0], 'start': indata[1], 'dx': indata[3], 'x_unit': indata[4], 'y_unit': indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d('test2.gwf', 'A1:TEST'); assert_array_equal(indata[0], indata2[0], 'read-write data mismatch'); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:], 'read-write metadata mismatch'; "
